about_the_game:
The KnuckleBonz Metaverse Music Experience (MME) is a multiplayer app where fans explore band museums, dive bars, play mini games, collect rare digital collectibles, and see album art come to life! KnuckleBonz works directly with each band; all content is officially licensed.

The KnuckleBonz “MME” offers a unique way to collect and showcase rare, limited edition, officially licensed band collectibles. The app provides a unique opportunity for Music SuperFans to connect with other fans, explore and learn more about the great moments in music, play mini games, and see album art come to life! 

With your free download, you can customize your Avatar, Hub, and more! Play mini games like can toss and trivia to rise up the leaderboards and earn KBonz Bucks that you can exchange for in-game rewards. 

Visit band/artist museums as a single user or with other fans around the world. Capture behind the scenes photos, collect digital and physical statues, and attend special events. Explore the great album art of the last 50 years that come alive and allow you to experience it like never before. 

Hang out at Riff n' Ruin, an awesome club experience for Music SuperFans. The KnuckleBonz Metaverse Music Experience (MME) gives you a chance to own digital collectibles that have real-life counterparts that include limited-edition statues, merch, and so much more!

All band content is officially licensed and created by KnuckleBonz, a high-end collectibles company that has been solely focused on honoring music legends since 2003.

content_descriptors.notes: KnuckleBonz Metaverse Music Experience features iconic imagery from the great bands of the last 50 years including album art, references to skulls, and other common horror themes.

name: KnuckleBonz Metaverse Music Experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: HDD Space: 10GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (or higher)
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB (or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: HDD Space: 10GB

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: KnuckleBonz has created an entire digital world to connect SuperFans with bands and album art like never before… Enter the MetalVerse™ if you dare!
